resources.string: "Orlando is more than just theme parks . It is more than just theme parks and rides. Orlando is a beautiful city that has so much to offer. Here are a few places to visit to learn more."
"Orlando has some great food from around the world. Because of all the tourist we have a melting pot of food. Here are a list of some good places.
"There is plenty to do in orlando, even if you are not a theme park person. Check out some of these places.
"Besides all the theme parks and buildings, Orlando is home to all kinds of animals and nature. From the wetlands to the beaches. Check some out.
